detaileddescription.para: Test if a GG_Result value represents a failure condition
Test if a GG_Result value represents a success condition

memberdef.name: GG_CHECK

detaileddescription.para: Check if a GG_Result return value represents a failure, and return that value if it does
Result indicating that the operation or call succeeded
Result indicating an unspecified failure condition

briefdescription.para: Base for general purpose error codes.
The operation would block / try again later.
Base for Remote API error codes.
Wrapper for an errno error code.

detaileddescription.para: Integer result value used by a wide number of functions and methods.
Error values are always negative, so this type may be overloaded to return positive values that are not considered error results.
